25.ara-name: كتاب الأطعمة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Tha'labah Al-Khushani: That he said: "O Messenger of Allah! We live in a land of the People of Book and we cook in their containers, and drink in their vessels." The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "If you do not find other than them, then rinse them with water." The he said: "O Messenger of Allah! We live in a land of game, so what should we do ?" He said: "When you send your trained dog, and you mentioned the Name of Allah, and he kills it, then eat it. And when you shoot it with your bow, and it is killed, then eat it.'" [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Hasan Sahih

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الأَكْلِ فِي آنِيَةِ الْكُفَّارِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Eating From Utensils Of The Disbelievers
